Header.heading: Hello, this is Derya
Header.description: I am a Fullstack Software Developer, and this is my portfolio.

Profile.heading: Profile
Profile.name: Name: Derya Akan
Profile.about_me_more: There are countless things I love, but in this limited space, I'll focus on one of my greatest passions: coding. As a dedicated full-stack developer, I thrive on creating user-friendly websites and applications. This portfolio showcases some of my proudest achievements so far. I'm particularly proud because, despite starting from scratch not long ago, I've already accomplished so much :)

Projects.heading: Projects
Projects.project1_description: A simple, customizable, minimal setup cookie plugin that allows your users to select which cookies to accept or decline. This was created with vanilla JS, SCSS and Parcel Bundler and is available as a NPM package and the git repository makes any type of customization to code and themes possible.

This was created with vanilla JS, SCSS and Parcel Bundler and is available as a NPM package and the git repository makes any type of customization to code and themes possible.

Footer.heading: Send me a message!
Footer.description: Got a question or proposal, or just want to say hello? Go ahead.
